review: ****** ** **** *********** * ************** We are very much impressed by his treatment. *** ****** **** ********** God bless him.

I visited at 6 as per my appointment time but after waiting till 6:45 I was told that the doctor won't be visiting before 8. Though I understand that he must have gotten caught up with something but I should have been informed about that earlier, not after waiting for 45 minutes.
reply_text: I m so sorry for your trouble. That day I got stuck up in a surgery. I have no intention to come late in my clinic.  You can call me directly for better communication. Thanks.

review: I visited Dr. Jain for my plaster care. When plaster was cut he did an x ray and detected minor fracture. But I met another  doctor for my condition. He examined bone dislocation and fracture. I will now be admitted to hospital and get my medical issues sorted. * ******* * ********** **** *** **** ****** **** ******** **** ***** *********** ***** ** *** *********** * ******* * ***** *********** *** *** * *** ******** ** *** ******* ** ****** ****** *** **** *** ********
He is our family doctor. Clinches diagnosis very early, advises very few test, compelets treatment in one or two visits.
I am very much impressed with Dr Raman jain. He treats and greets his patients like his family members. I m fully satisfied his treatment. * * ****** ****
Wonderful experience with a doctor, polite, humble , listens everything carefully, never in hurry. Diagnosing perfectly.
Doctor is very nice . he diagnosed correctly & operated on my  rt knee for ligament reconstruction.  My knee is pain free  fully functional. I m very happy.
Doctor is good ,smart, catches diagnosis immediately, listens everything. We will recommend him to our colleagues for sure.
Doctor is very experienced, humble, polite, catches diagnosis very fast. We are very happy to come here. Let see result of prescribed medications.
